basic package¶

Module contents¶

basic.common_average_rereferncing module¶

Created on Jun 2, 2020

author

voodoocode

basic.common_average_rereferncing.run(data)¶

Applies common average re-referencing.

Parameters

data – Channels x samples.

Returns

Common average re-referenced data.

basic.downsampling module¶

Created on Jun 2, 2020

author

voodoocode

basic.downsampling.run(data, src_freq, tgt_freq)¶

Downsamples a signal (data) from src_freq to tgt_freq.

Parameters

  • src_freq – The original frequency of the signal.

  • tgt_freq – the new frequency of the signal.

Returns

Downsampled data
